author: Brad Colbow
description:
E Ink Tablet Rankings: https://www.bradsartschool.com/best-eink-tablets
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com

I got a lot of comments about the ReMarkable Paper Pro and my review last fall. Many of them told me that I was missing the point. The simplicity and lack of features made the tablet great for distraction free work. SO today I'm revisiting it and sharing my thoughts.
